title: Robin and Mab
description:
This is Paranormal Romance at it's Best   
  Entertaining, Fun and Exciting
When Layel Helberg marries Robin Goodfellow, fairyland goes into meltdown. She wants to become a fairy and share her life with her new husband. Her jealous and powerful grandmother has other ideas and now that she knows what Robin is capable of, she wants him for herself. The red hot Ice Queen has all sorts of tricks up her sleeve. ˃˃˃ Robin and Layel are very much in love - but will their love be enough to get them back together?  
  Scroll up and grab a copy today.
author: Penelope Jane Kent
